001
002package com.commercetools.api.models.product;
003
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.Objects;
006import java.util.Optional;
007
008import javax.annotation.Nullable;
009
010import com.commercetools.api.models.category.CategoryReference;
011import com.commercetools.api.models.common.LocalizedString;
012import com.commercetools.api.models.common.MetaAttributes;
013import com.commercetools.api.models.common.WithLocalizedSlug;
014import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnore;
015
016/**
017 * Interface to describe commonalities between differen product representations
018 */
019public interface ProductDataLike extends WithLocalizedSlug, MetaAttributes {
020
021    LocalizedString getName();
022
023    List<CategoryReference> getCategories();
024
025    @Nullable
026    LocalizedString getDescription();
027
028    LocalizedString getSlug();
029
030    @Nullable
031    LocalizedString getMetaTitle();
032
033    @Nullable
034    LocalizedString getMetaDescription();
035
036    @Nullable
037    LocalizedString getMetaKeywords();
038
039    /**
040     * Returns the master variant. Every product as 1 to n variants, so this is always present.
041     *
042     * @see #getAllVariants()
043     * @see #getVariants()
044     * @return the main variant in the product
045     */
046    ProductVariant getMasterVariant();
047
048    /**
049     * Gets the variants which are not identical to the master variant. This list can be empty.
050     *
051     * @see #getAllVariants()
052     * @see #getMasterVariant()
053     *
054     *
055     * @return all variants except the one in {@link #getMasterVariant()}
056     */
057    List<ProductVariant> getVariants();
058
059    /**
060     * Gets all variants in the product including the master variant as first element in the list.
061     *
062     * @see #getMasterVariant()
063     * @see #getVariants()
064     * @return all variants
065     */
066    @JsonIgnore
067    default List<ProductVariant> getAllVariants() {
068        return ProductsPackage.getAllVariants(this);
069    }
070
071    /**
072     * Finds a product variant by id.
073     *
074     * @param variantId the id of the variant to find
075     * @return variant or null if no variant exists with {@code id}
076     */
077    @Nullable
078    default ProductVariant getVariant(final long variantId) {
079        final ProductVariant result;
080        if (variantId == getMasterVariant().getId()) {
081            result = getMasterVariant();
082        }
083        else {
084            result = getVariants().stream().filter(v -> v.getId() == variantId).findFirst().orElse(null);
085        }
086        return result;
087    }
088
089    /**
090     * Finds a product variant by id and returns the master variant if not variant with the id is present.
091     * @param variantId the id of the variant to find
092     * @return a variant
093     */
094    default ProductVariant getVariantOrMaster(final long variantId) {
095        return ProductsPackage.getVariantOrMaster(variantId, this);
096    }
097
098    /**
099     * Finds a variant by SKU.
100     * @param sku the sku for the variant
101     * @return Optional of the found variant
102     */
103    default Optional<ProductVariant> findVariantBySku(final String sku) {
104        Objects.requireNonNull(sku);
105        return getAllVariants().stream().filter(v -> sku.equals(v.getSku())).findFirst();
106    }
107
108    SearchKeywords getSearchKeywords();
109
110    @Nullable
111    CategoryOrderHints getCategoryOrderHints();
112}
